samples.transcript: There are quite a few household items that can be hazardous to health if not used well immediately a blender a kitchen knife and a hairdryer come to mind these items can either cut burn or electrocute the user i know I have cut myself with a knife a few times in the past which of these most often leads to injuries i would say that the kitchen knife is probably the one that most commonly injures people just because it is frequently used i mean there are probably thousands of people around the world right now cutting a finger while I am finishing this sentence where are some common places where people can encounter lots of dangerous items well aside from the kitchen at home construction sites come to mind like where a new building is being put up there are many types of heavy machinery which can be quite dangerous if people are not careful how has technological advancements reduce the danger of certain tools new innovations have made a lot of equipment much safer than in the past new types of sensors and materials reduce the likelihood of getting injured can you give a couple examples of this yes like the chainsaw that i had talked about it has a safety guard added to it and my uncle's table saw will turn off as soon as a person's hand is too close to it also safety gear like helmets and clothes are much brighter and stronger than in the past.

samples.question: [Transcript chunk 3]
samples.transcript: Now it was the time when i was in my college graduation at punjabi university patala at that time one of my friend was very bulky at that time he even tortured and abused by other classmates due to his heavy weight he was nearly 90 kg at that time so he feels very depressed and due to his overweight at that time as i am very good and physique as well as maintain my good balance diet so he he come to me at the time i decided to help my friend because he has he is very bulky so i decided to help my friend to shut up to shut off their extra calories that is why i make i made a an adequate diet plan through which it comprises of good fatty fats proteins as well as moderate quantity of carbohydrates so it is very necessary to cut down extra carbohydrates from our diet to shed up to shut off extra pounds of weight so it is it was a very interesting time so which i helped my friend and after that i also make i also made a plan to do different type of exercise daily and he also joined me during my gym sessions and i and i helped my friend a lot and after the hardcore training of nearly two months he shut up nearly four five kg of weight nearly he also reduced some water retention which was collected around his body so i think it is very a good experience for me to help one of my friends and he also get good compliments from our classmates as well as from there from his family so i feel very proud at that moment and i also are thankful to.

samples.transcript: Should be free for students absolutely I think anyone I do not think anyone should be denied their right to education just because of their financial situation I think that is very unfair and I think the government should do what it takes to improve the situation do you think students from all majors should study subjects like math and history well absolutely I think math is important in every single major I do not think there is a major that does not require math and as for history it is our country's history I think it is very important it is part for culture and our tradition and we should never forget our Roots so I think history is also very important what are the differences between the public university and the private universities in my country I will would say the private universities are more expensive and education quality might be the same but in terms of cost ID say public universities are more affordable and I think that is why people tend to have higher attendance and more people get accepted into public universities right how technology has brought benefits to the way students prepare for their exams I think it has immensely improved the way students prepare I think you can go to YouTube and if you are having a problem the YouTube video can solve your problem in minutes and there are many websites that can help a student prepare for many subjects you name it it is all it is all there the last question is how the use of technology in the classrooms will bring more benefits to teachers and students I think we are seeing it right now and I think it benefits the students and the teachers a lot for the teachers it gives them freedom to explain.

samples.question: [Transcript chunk 6]

samples.question: [Transcript chunk 8]
